text: 瞳の色は、産んでくれた母親譲り
"translation": Her eye color came from her birth mother.

text: シューズ用にとお小遣いを増やしてくれた
"translation": They give her extra money for shoes.

text: 試しにパパママ呼びをやめたら泣かれた
"translation": She cried when she stopped calling her mom and dad.

text: 真っ赤なスーパーカーは、父のお古
"translation": She drives her father's second-hand red supercar.

text: 舞台一家で、両親は全国を飛び回っている
"translation": She comes from a stage family, her parents travel all over the country.

text: 家族旅行と言えば温泉で、ある秘湯の常連
"translation": Family vacations mean hot springs, and she is a regular at one of the hidden hot springs.

text: 国家レベルの機密事項らしい
"translation": They seem to be a national secret.

text: よく父とヤンチャして、母に叱られている
"translation": Her and her dad are very mischievous together, they get scolded by her mom a lot.

text: 仕事熱心な母親に憧れと恋しい思いがある
"translation": She misses her mother, who's always enthusiastic about her work

text: 実家にはウェルカム花火が常備されている
"translation": My parents always welcome fireworks in the house.

text: 日本好きは親の影響。実家には和室もある
"translation": \My parents influenced my love for Japan. My parents have a Japanese-style room in their house.\""

text: 姐御肌は母譲りで、こう見えて末っ子
"translation": She's the youngest child, but has a mother's touch.

text: 両親には「マックちゃん」と呼ばれている
"translation": Her parents call her \Mac-chan\"."

text: マンボという鷹と、姉弟のように育った
"translation": She grew up with a hawk named Mambo, he's like her sibling.

text: 美しい自分を生み育てた親を尊敬している
"translation": She respects her parents for raising her to be gorgeous.

text: 両親と姉いわく『寡黙なのは、優しい証拠』
"translation": Her parents and sister always say \taciturnity is a sign of kindness\"."

text: 幼い頃から、帝王学を両親自ら教えていた
"translation": Her parents taught her Imperialism from a young age.

text: 母の誕生会は、1年かけ緻密に計画している
"translation": She spends all year meticulously planning her mother's birthday party

text: 家族の趣味は、キャンプ！フェス！BBQ！
"translation": My family's hobbies include: Camping! Festivals! BBQ!

text: 帰省時は、釣り仲間の祖父と船釣りをする
"translation": When she goes home, she goes fishing with her grandfather and his fishing buddies.

text: 弟妹たちといる時は『タマねぇね』になる
"translation": When she's with her brothers and sisters, she's called \Tama-nee\"."

text: 奔放で開けっ広げな姉の扱いが親以上に上手
"translation": She's better at taking care of her uninhibited and open-minded sister than her parents are.

text: 昔は、母が姉妹でおそろいの髪型にしていた
"translation": Her mother and her sister used to have matching hairstyles.

text: 空港は、パイロットの父との遊び場だった
"translation": Her father was a pilot, so the airport was her playground.

text: 家族でコーヒー愛好家のため、豆は直輸入
"translation": Her family loves coffee, so their beans are specially imported.

text: 家電がよく壊れるため一家でアナログ生活中
"translation": Her family is living in an old-fashioned home because of the frequent breakage of household appliances.

text: 父はとても若々しく、よく兄妹に間違われる
"translation": Her father is very young and is often mistaken for her brother.

text: 父は料理の師匠で、母はお菓子作りの先生
"translation": Her father is a master chef and her mother is a baking teacher.

text: 上京後も方言が残る娘に、少し安心している
"translation": Reliefed their daughter retains her dialect after going to the city

text: 昔は、両親の絵本の読み聞かせで寝ていた
"translation": She used to fall asleep listening to her parents read picture books.

text: 『出かける時は、手を繋ぐ』が家族ルール
レース界での名声華々しい一家の、異端児
"translation": The unorthodox child of a family with a spectacular reputation in the racing world.

text: 誕生日ケーキは毎年2つ用意する
"translation": They prepare two birthday cakes every year.

text: 風呂の順番はメンコで決めるのが家族ルール
ダービー観戦は、何よりも大切な家族行事
"translation": Watching the Derby together is the most important family event of all.

text: 母からの仕送りの箱は、開けたことがない
ケーキ屋さん経営中。名物はバウムクーヘン
"translation": They run a cake shop, and their specialty is baumkuchen.

text: 娘ロスの家族が、学園スタッフの求人に応募
"translation": They missed their daughter so much that they applied to be members of Tracen Academy's staff.

text: 服は可愛くて丈夫なものを選んでくれていた
"translation": They always picked out cute and durable clothes for her.

text: 透き通った肌は母、輝くブロンドは父譲り
"translation": Her mother has clear skin, and her father is a brilliant blonde.

text: 家訓は『褒めて褒めて褒めて、褒めたい！』
"translation": Her family's motto is \Praise

text: 家族でお揃いのサングラスを持っている
"translation": Her whole family has matching sunglasses

text: 父親と電話すると、切る前に必ず泣かれる
実家の託児所は、アットホームさが評判
"translation": Her family's day-care center has a reputation for making people feel at home.

text: 髪飾りは、母お手製のアイドル衣装第1号
"translation": Her hair ornament is from the first idol costume that her mother made.

text: 野菜から食べなさい、が1番怒られた思い出
"translation": Her parents always told her to eat her veggies first, that always made her the most upset.

text: 家族全員、寝相が悪い
ママ友BNWが結成秒読みとのウワサ
"translation": Rumor has it that the moms of BNW are friends now.

text: 両親からもらったじょうろは今も宝物
1番好きな母の料理は、にんじんごはん
"translation": Her favorite dish was her mother's carrot rice.

text: 熱血体育教師の父は、師匠であり原点
優秀な姉は、妹の明るさに憧れている
"translation": Like an excellent older sister, she admires her younger sister's cheerfulness.

text: 転勤族ゆえに語学堪能。娘も、言わずもがな
『ベルちゃん』呼び禁止令に、父は凹みがち
実家のスナックには娘の記事が飾ってある
母は家事が壊滅的にできず、使用人がいる
帰省すると実家の定食屋に横断幕がかかる
"translation": Whenever she goes home, her parents hang a banner at their restaurant.

text: 父はゴルフの師匠だが、スコアは逆転した
父は名士であり、ウマ娘界の慈善家でもある
父の弟子たちも同居の、30人家族
夕飯は家族でよく鍋を囲んでいた
母が、学園の友だちを家に招きたがっている
帰省した時は必ず祖父の肩たたきをする
帰省シーズンは家族総出で迎えに来る
地元で、妖精が住むファンシーな家と有名
ソファで眠る母をベッドまで運ぶ係だった
きょうだいが多いから、とっても賑やか☆
家族で1番、母親がゆったりしている
